name: Dororo
summary_text: A father in pursuit of power gives parts of his new-born son to a host of demons. Years later, the son battles those demons to regain what is rightfully his.

name: Zeroville
summary_text: A young ex-communicated seminarian, Ike "Vikar" Jerome, arrives in Los Angeles on the same August day in 1969 that a crazed hippie ''family'' led by Charles Manson commits five savage murders.

name: Star Trek: Prodigy
summary_text: A group of teenagers steal a derelict Starfleet vessel and use it to explore the galaxy.

name: Transformers: War for Cybertron Trilogy
summary_text: Animated series set in the world of battling Autobots and Decepticons.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
summary_text: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

name: The Straight Story
summary_text: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

name: In & Out
summary_text: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

name: My Salinger Year
summary_text: A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger.

name: Freud
summary_text: Young Czech-Austrian psychoanalyst, Sigmund Freud, investigates a murder conspiracy in 1880's Vienna.

name: Croupier
summary_text: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

name: An Education
summary_text: A coming-of-age story about a teenage girl in 1960s suburban London, and how her life changes with the arrival of a playboy nearly twice her age.

name: Gothika
summary_text: A depressed psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.

name: Patrick Melrose
summary_text: Based on the Patrick Melrose Novels by Edward St. Aubyn.

name: If I Stay
summary_text: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

name: Keeping the Faith
summary_text: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

name: Less Than Zero
summary_text: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

name: Kung Fu
summary_text: The adventures of a Shaolin Monk as he wanders the American West armed only with his skill in Kung Fu.

name: Carnage
summary_text: Two pairs of parents hold a cordial meeting after their sons are involved in a fight, though as their time together progresses, increasingly childish behavior throws the discussion into chaos.

name: The Adam Project
summary_text: A man must travel back in time to get help from his 13-year-old self.

name: Secret Things
summary_text: Two young women find themselves struggling to survive in Paris, street-wise Nathalie, a stripper, and naïve Sandrine, a barmaid. Together, they discover that sex can be used to their ...                See full summary »

name: Where Eagles Dare
summary_text: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

name: Imagine Me & You
summary_text: A newlywed bride becomes infatuated with another woman who questions her sexual orientation, promoting a stir among the bride's family and friends.

name: All About Anna
summary_text: Anna is a modern, independent single girl, focused on her job and wary of getting caught in romantic relationships. Her life is all about fun. Strangers without strings. No commitment, no ...                See full summary »

name: The Devil's Own
summary_text: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

name: Shake It Up
summary_text: Two Chicago teens attempt to realize their dream of becoming professional dancers by landing spots on a popular local show.

name: I'll Be Gone in the Dark
summary_text: Gripping examination of the unsolved crimes of the Golden State Killer who terrorized California in the 1970's and 1980's.

name: Flashforward
summary_text: A special task force in the FBI investigates after every person on Earth simultaneously blacks out and awakens with a short vision of their future.

name: Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
summary_text: Shawn and Gus return to Santa Barbara, California to help their old police chief, but find themselves unwelcome in their old stomping ground as they secretly untangle a case that involves the supernatural.

name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
summary_text: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

name: Turner & Hooch
summary_text: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

name: Little Fockers
summary_text: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker, have what it takes?

name: Double Indemnity
summary_text: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

name: The Black Hole
summary_text: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

name: The Boss
summary_text: A titan of industry is sent to prison after she's caught insider trading. When she emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, not everyone she screwed over is so quick to forgive and forget.

name: Fathers & Daughters
summary_text: A Pulitzer-winning writer grapples with being a widower and father after a mental breakdown, while, 27 years later, his grown daughter struggles to forge connections of her own.

name: Cobra
summary_text: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

name: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
summary_text: An unbalanced but alluring former mental patient takes a porn star prisoner in the hopes of convincing her to marry him.

name: Bad Boy Bubby
summary_text: Bubby has spent thirty years trapped in the same small room, tricked by his mother. One day, he manages to escape, and, deranged and naive in equal measures, his adventure into the modern and nihilistic life begins.

name: Jindabyne
summary_text: After four men on a fishing trip discover a dead body in the water, they choose to delay reporting it and continue fishing.

name: Mortal
summary_text: Fantasy adventure origin story about a young man discovering he has God-like powers based on ancient Norwegian mythology.

name: From Here to Eternity
summary_text: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

name: I Love You Phillip Morris
summary_text: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

name: Holmes & Watson
summary_text: A humorous take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mysteries featuring Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.

name: Detachment
summary_text: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
summary_text: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.

name: Valhalla Rising
summary_text: Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.

name: The Letter for the King
summary_text: Tiuri, a teenage squire, answers a call for help that sends him on a perilous mission across the three kingdoms to deliver a secret letter to the King.

name: Survival Island
summary_text: Three people - a rich couple and a crew member - are shipwrecked on a tropical island and their subsequent fight for survival becomes even tougher when they begin to turn on each other.

name: Lady and the Tramp
summary_text: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

name: The Number 23
summary_text: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him, as more and more similarities between himself and his literary alter ego seem to arise.

name: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight
summary_text: A group of technology-dependent teenagers goes to offline camp and faces a deadly danger lurking in the woods.

name: Anatomy of a Murder
summary_text: In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

name: The Blacklist: Redemption
summary_text: Covert operative Tom Keen joins forces with Susan "Scottie" Hargrave, the brilliant and cunning chief of a covert mercenary organization that solves problems that are too dangerous for the government.

name: Anthropoid
summary_text: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

name: St. Trinian's
summary_text: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

name: Key and Peele
summary_text: Project sees Keegan-Michael Key and Jordan Peele in front of a live studio audience bantering about a topic weaved between filmed shorts and sketches.

name: The Deep Blue Sea
summary_text: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.

name: Lux Æterna
summary_text: Two actresses, Béatrice Dalle and Charlotte Gainsbourg, are on a film set telling stories about witches - but that's not all. 'Lux Æterna' is also an essay on cinema, the love of film, and on-set hysterics.

name: Liverpool Narcos
summary_text: A look back to the 1980's, Liverpool when the city became the epicentre of a drugs boom that was to change Britain forever.

name: Father Knows Best
summary_text: The popular radio show comes to life in this hit sitcom about a wise family man, Jim Anderson, his common-sense wife Margaret and their children Betty, Bud and Kathy.

name: Mr. Bean
summary_text: Bumbling, childlike Mr. Bean has trouble completing the simplest of tasks in day-to-day life, but his perseverance and resourcefulness frequently allow him to find ingenious ways around problems.

name: Limitless
summary_text: An average twenty-eight-year-old man who gains the ability to use the full extent of his brain's capabilities is hired by the F.B.I. as a consultant.

name: Unit Eleven
summary_text: 'In the year 2035, survivors of a now almost completely evacuated post-apocalyptic Britain compete for a government bounty to retrieve a mysterious bio weapon known only as Unit Eleven...'

name: The Muppet Show
summary_text: Kermit the Frog and his fellow Muppets put on a vaudeville show at their theatre, bringing in a famous celebrity to help out for each episode.

name: All Is Lost
summary_text: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
summary_text: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

name: Waco
summary_text: The FBI and ATF seize religious leader David Koresh's Branch Davidian compound near Waco, Texas in the spring of 1993.

name: Seed of Chucky
summary_text: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent gender-confused daughter, Glenda, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

name: The Beverly Hillbillies
summary_text: A feature adaptation of the classic television show, when nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil, and moves him and his kin to posh Beverly Hills.

name: American Wedding
summary_text: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.

name: Dog Soldiers
summary_text: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

name: Between Two Ferns: The Movie
summary_text: Zach Galifianakis and his oddball crew take a road trip to complete a series of high-profile celebrity interviews.

name: Far and Away
summary_text: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

name: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
summary_text: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

name: High Noon
summary_text: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.

name: Trinkets
summary_text: An unexpected friendship forms when three teenage girls meet in Shoplifters Anonymous.

name: Phone Booth
summary_text: Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.

name: Louie
summary_text: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

name: This Country
summary_text: Comedy exploring the lives of young people in modern rural Britain, focusing on cousins Kerry and Kurtan and their lives in the Cotswolds.

name: Mobeomtaeksi
summary_text: The story of a deluxe taxi driver who gets revenge on behalf of his passengers. It is based on the webtoon Deluxe Taxi by Carlos and Lee Jae-jin

name: Cujo
summary_text: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

name: The Partridge Family
summary_text: The humorous adventures of a family of pop musicians.

name: Emma
summary_text: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

name: Bitter Moon
summary_text: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
summary_text: A monster hunter for hire embarks on an epic journey to find his former apprentice before The Wild Hunt can capture her and bring about the destruction of the world.

name: The Grifters
summary_text: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

name: How Do You Know
summary_text: After being cut from the U.S.A. softball team and feeling a bit past her prime, Lisa finds herself evaluating her life and in the middle of a love triangle, as a corporate guy in crisis competes with her current, baseball-playing beau.

name: Border
summary_text: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

name: High Seas
summary_text: Two sisters discover disturbing family secrets after a string of mysterious deaths occur on a luxury ship traveling from Spain to Brazil in the 1940s.

name: Days Gone
summary_text: Two years after a devastating global pandemic, bounty hunter Deacon St. John faces a brutal struggle for survival, and a reason to live.

name: Harry and the Hendersons
summary_text: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

name: Young Adult
summary_text: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

name: Traitors
summary_text: A British civil servant agrees to spy on her own government for the Americans in the aftermath of WWII.

name: The Tomorrow People
summary_text: Evolved humans with amazing abilities (Teleportation, Telekinesis, Telepathy) are being hunted down by agents of Ultra.

name: Soulmates
summary_text: This takes place 15 years from now, when science makes a discovery that changes the lives of everyone on the planet - a way to find your soulmate through six provocative stories about the cost of finding true love.

name: The Great Dictator
summary_text: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

name: You Me Her
summary_text: Centers around a three-way romantic relationship involving a loving suburban married couple and another woman.

name: Everything, Everything
summary_text: A teenager who's spent her whole life confined to her home falls for the boy next door.

name: Curve
summary_text: A soon-to-be bride on her way to a wedding rehearsal is having second thoughts and decides to take a detour. Car breaks down and a hitchiker offers help. Could it be fate?

name: Anatomy of Hell
summary_text: A woman employs a gay man to spend four nights at her house to watch her when she's "unwatchable".

name: Wolf Hall
summary_text: After the downfall of Cardinal Wolsey, his secretary, Thomas Cromwell, finds himself amongst the treachery and intrigue of King Henry VIII's court and soon becomes a close advisor to the King, a role fraught with danger.

name: The People vs. Larry Flynt
summary_text: The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.

name: Hard Kill
summary_text: The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers (Willis) is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn
summary_text: In a primitive tribal world where strange, monstrous, animalistic machines roam the wilderness, a brave young female warrior goes on a quest to learn the truth about her mysterious origin and the state the world is in.

name: The Void
summary_text: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.

name: Modern Times
summary_text: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

name: Letters to Juliet
summary_text: Sophie dreams of becoming a writer and travels to Verona, Italy where she meets the "Secretaries of Juliet".

name: The Married Woman
summary_text: A wife, a mom, a teacher, a homemaker, she's played all the roles, but what about being true to herself? Being Astha? Be a part of Astha's journey as she breaks boundaries, set by society, to find herself.

name: Rashomon
summary_text: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

name: Giant
summary_text: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

name: Battle Los Angeles
summary_text: A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.

name: Ouija
summary_text: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

name: Samson and Delilah
summary_text: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences they both regret.

name: The General's Daughter
summary_text: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

name: Run Lola Run
summary_text: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

name: La Dolce Vita
summary_text: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

name: High on the Hog: How African American Cuisine Transformed America
summary_text: Black food is American food. Chef and writer Stephen Satterfield traces the delicious, moving throughlines from Africa to Texas in this docuseries.

name: Fosse/Verdon
summary_text: An inside look at the romantic and creative partnership between influential choreographer/director, Bob Fosse, and Gwen Verdon, one of the greatest Broadway dancers of all time.

name: This Is England '90
summary_text: The year is 1990, the rave scene has just entered England. The sound of the Stone roses lurks toward Shaun and the gang. This means that Woody and Lol are living in a domestic bliss, they are happy again. But this year will see huge changes in everyone. This is the year 1990. This is England.

name: Night School
summary_text: A group of high school dropouts are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.

name: And So It Goes
summary_text: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

name: The Lord of the Rings
summary_text: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

name: Secret Society of Second Born Royals
summary_text: Follows Sam's adventures at a top-secret training program for a new class of second-born royals tasked with saving the world.

name: Gabriel's Inferno: Part One
summary_text: An intriguing exploration of seduction, forbidden love, and redemption, a captivating and passionate tale of one man's escape from his own personal hell as he tries to earn the impossible: forgiveness and love.

name: U-571
summary_text: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

name: One Mississippi
summary_text: This semi-autobiographical dark comedy starring Tig Notaro follows her as she returns to her hometown after the sudden death of her mother. Still reeling from her own declining health ...                See full summary »

name: The American President
summary_text: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

name: Teen Beach Movie
summary_text: Two surfing lovers, whose doomed relationship is nearing to a close, find themselves swept into a dimension-traversing wave that sends them into a beach movie musical in the 60's.

name: Homework
summary_text: Virginia (Maria Rojo) is taking a class at film school, and has decided on her solo project for the class. She will film herself and her ex-husband Marcelo (Jose Alonso) (who likes to leave...                See full summary »

name: The Retreat
summary_text: A lesbian couple with a rocky relationship goes to a pre-wedding retreat and ends up fighting for their lives when a group of militant serial killers tries to murder them.

name: My Summer of Love
summary_text: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

name: War Machine
summary_text: An idiosyncratic general confronts opposition from enemies, allies, and bureaucrats while leading a massive rebuilding operation in Afghanistan.

name: Failure to Launch
summary_text: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.

name: Monamour
summary_text: A neglected housewife has an affair behind her boring husband's back, triggering a passionate transformation. Now, a dash of infidelity awakens his dormant enthusiasm for her; however, is his new-found interest too little, too late?

name: Yoga Hosers
summary_text: Two teenage yoga enthusiasts must do battle with an evil presence that is threatening to rise from its underground lair and endanger their major party plans.

name: The Report
summary_text: Idealistic Senate staffer Daniel J. Jones, tasked by his boss to lead an investigation into the CIA's post 9/11 Detention and Interrogation Program, uncovers shocking secrets.

name: The Coroner
summary_text: A solicitor returns to the seaside town she left as a teenager to take up the post of coroner, becoming an advocate for the dead as she investigates sudden, violent or unexplained deaths.

name: Grand Prix
summary_text: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard.

name: The Little Vampire
summary_text: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

name: The Saint
summary_text: Simon Templar a wealthy adventurer known as The Saint, travels around in his white Volvo P1800S.

name: Marauders
summary_text: When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

name: Blackhat
summary_text: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

name: Stir Crazy
summary_text: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.

name: Pablo Escobar: El Patrón del Mal
summary_text: The exploits of the notorious drug lord, Pablo Escobar.

name: Lawn Dogs
summary_text: When Devon, a 10-year-old girl, forges a friendship with Trent, a 21-year-old outsider who mows the neighborhood lawns, things suddenly get very complicated and private.

name: Effie Gray
summary_text: A look at the scandalous love triangle between Victorian art critic John Ruskin (Greg Wise), his teenage bride Euphemia "Effie" Gray (Dakota Fanning), and Pre-Raphaelite painter John Everett Millais (Tom Sturridge).

name: Dublin Murders
summary_text: Crime series based on the novels by Tana French.

name: How to Sell Drugs Online (Fast)
summary_text: To win back the love of his life, a high school student and his best friend launch Europe's largest online drug business from their teenage bedroom.

name: To Tell the Truth
summary_text: Three contestants claim to be a person with an unusual distinction or occupation. One is telling the truth, and the other two are impostors. Four celebrity panelists ask them questions to figure out who is telling the truth.

name: Hausu
summary_text: A schoolgirl and six of her classmates travel to her aunt's country home, which turns out to be haunted.

name: Gimme a Break!
summary_text: Nell agrees to look after the Kanisky's home, as a special favor to her dying friend, and takes on the role of housekeeper to widowed police chief Carl and a parental figure to his three teenage daughters, and eventually a foster son.

name: From Straight A's to XXX
summary_text: In order to pay her college tuition, a young woman turns to the adult film industry and must balance her personal life with a new life as porn star Belle Knox.

name: Jaws 3-D
summary_text: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

name: 10x10
summary_text: A man abducts a flower shop owner and holds her captive in a small, soundproof room in an effort to extract a dark secret from her past.

name: Tale of the Nine Tailed
summary_text: An urban dark fantasy drama about a gumiho who settles into the city and a producer who is after it.

name: Bride Wars
summary_text: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

name: Birds of Prey
summary_text: In the future, long after the Batman has driven himself into exile, his legacy lives on in the form of the Birds of Prey--Black Canary, Oracle, and the Huntress.

name: Hwarang: The Poet Warrior Youth
summary_text: Revolves around an elite group of male warrior youth called Hwarang who grow through passion and love in Seorabeol, the capital of the ancient kingdom of Silla.

name: Tremors: Shrieker Island
summary_text: When a group of hunters genetically modify Graboid eggs, they face an all-out war against the larger, terrifyingly intelligent Graboids, and the swiftly multiplying Shriekers.

name: Collateral Damage
summary_text: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
summary_text: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

name: The Champions
summary_text: After a plane carrying three UN Agents crashes in the Himalayas, they are rescued by an advanced civilisation secretly living in Tibet who grant them enhanced versions of the ordinary five senses, and intellectual and physical abilities.

name: Cagney & Lacey
summary_text: Two female police detectives cooperate with each other both in their professions and in their personal lives.

name: Baggio: The Divine Ponytail
summary_text: Biographical film about Italian footballer Roberto Baggio, a man who inspired entire generations to play football. A unique footballer, capable of thrilling fans all over the world.

name: Y: The Last Man
summary_text: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, Y is the last surviving male human on the planet. Based on the comic series "Y: The Last Man."

name: A Man Called Ove
summary_text: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

name: The Day of the Beast
summary_text: Bent on committing as many sins as possible to avert the birth of the beast, a Catholic priest teams up with a Black Metal aficionado and an Italian connoisseur of the occult. Now, he must become an unrelenting sinner. Is there still hope?

name: Coma
summary_text: After a mysterious accident a young architect comes back to his senses in a very odd world. He must find out the exact laws and regulations of it as he fights for his life and keeps on looking for the exit to the real world.

name: Life on Mars
summary_text: After being involved in a car accident in 2006, DCI Sam Tyler wakes up to find himself in 1973, the era of 'Sweeney' type policing, Mark III Cortinas, and flared trousers.

name: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends
summary_text: This series follows the adventures of Thomas the Tank Engine and all of his engine friends on the Island of Sodor.

name: The Last Vermeer
summary_text: An artist is suspected of selling a valuable painting to the Nazis, but there is more to the story than meets the eye.

name: King of New York
summary_text: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

name: On the Road
summary_text: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

name: Chappelle's Show
summary_text: Comedian Dave Chappelle hosts this sketch-comedy show that parodies many of the nuances of race and culture.

name: The Fox and the Hound
summary_text: A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

name: Free Rein
summary_text: After befriending a mysterious horse during a summer in the English countryside, 15-year-old Zoe finds the strength to deal with issues she faces.

name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
summary_text: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned U.S.S. Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

name: The Phenomenon
summary_text: This documentary examines unidentified aerial phenomenon. With testimony from high-ranking government officials, and NASA Astronauts, Senator Harry Reid says it "makes the incredible credible."

name: MacGruber
summary_text: Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

name: Shoot 'Em Up
summary_text: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.

name: Vox Lux
summary_text: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.

name: The Path
summary_text: A man who converts to a controversial following suffers from a crisis of faith.

name: Charm City Kings
summary_text: Fourteen-year-old Mouse desperately wants to join the Midnight Clique, an infamous group of Baltimore dirt-bike riders who rule the summertime streets.

name: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
summary_text: Gordon Ramsay journeys to some of the most incredible and remote locations on Earth in search of culinary inspiration, epic adventures, and cultural experiences he will never forget.

name: Fever Pitch
summary_text: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

name: American Murder: The Family Next Door
summary_text: In 2018, 34-year-old Shanann Watts and her two young daughters disappear in Colorado. With the heartbreaking details emerging, the family's story made headlines around the world.

name: No Retreat, No Surrender
summary_text: Jason, a Bruce Lee fan, sees his karate instructor/dad beaten by martial art thugs. They move to Seattle where, after humiliations, he trains with Bruce Lee's ghost so he can defend himself and others against thugs.

name: Left Behind
summary_text: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

name: Escape Plan 2: Hades
summary_text: Years after he fought his way out of an inescapable prison, Ray Breslin has organized a new top-notch security force. But when one of his team members goes missing, Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from.

name: Hand of God
summary_text: A morally-corrupt judge suffers a breakdown and believes God is compelling him onto a path of vigilante justice.

name: Kung Fu Mulan
summary_text: Disguising herself as a man to take her father's place, Mulan is a wild and rebellious soldier in the army. As a gifted swords-woman, she also dreams about going out and exploring the world...                See full summary »

name: A Very English Scandal
summary_text: British Liberal Party leader Jeremy Thorpe is accused of conspiracy to murder his gay ex-lover and forced to stand trial in 1979.

name: Samurai Champloo
summary_text: Fuu, a waitress who works in a teahouse, rescues two master swordsmen, Mugen and Jin, from their execution to help her find the "samurai who smells of sunflowers."

name: The Fugitive
summary_text: With the city in a state of panic and misinformation traveling at the speed of social media, Mike's life and family hang in the balance as he becomes - The Fugitive.

name: Rose Island
summary_text: An idealistic engineer builds his own island off the Italian coast and declares it a nation, drawing the world's attention. Values are tested when the Italian Government declares him an enemy, but to change the world risks must be taken.

name: Wild Hogs
summary_text: A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.

name: Fahrenheit 451
summary_text: In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.

name: The Signal
summary_text: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.

name: Alpha
summary_text: In the prehistoric past, a young man struggles to return home after being separated from his tribe during a buffalo hunt. He finds a similarly lost wolf companion and starts a friendship that would change humanity.

name: Bump
summary_text: An unexpected pregnancy complicates the lives of two families. The series centers around Oly, an ambitious and high-achieving teenage girl who has a surprise baby.

name: Swiss Family Robinson
summary_text: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

name: Sabrina
summary_text: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

name: Hige o Soru. Soshite Joshikousei o Hirou.
summary_text: An office worker takes in a runaway school girl. Despite the difference in age and personalities, they form a bond.

name: Cop Out
summary_text: Jimmy's rare baseball card is robbed. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his cop partner Paul to track down the robber, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

name: The Great Escapists
summary_text: Shipwrecked on a remote desert island, Hammond and Belleci use their engineering and scientific skills to not only to survive, but to construct a paradise island playground.

name: Calibre
summary_text: A shocking deed turned their weekend trip into a nightmare. Now their only hope is to swallow their paranoia and act normal.

name: Tower Heist
summary_text: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

name: Slap Shot
summary_text: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

name: Hold the Dark
summary_text: After the deaths of three children suspected to be killed by wolves, writer Russell Core is hired by the mother of a missing six-year-old boy to track down and locate her son in the Alaskan wilderness.

name: Basic
summary_text: A D.E.A. Agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army Ranger Drill Sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

name: Gold Diggers: The Secret of Bear Mountain
summary_text: A city girl teams up with a tomboy to solve the mystery of Bear Mountain, Molly Morgan, and the buried treasure as well as learn about true friendships.

name: My Week with Marilyn
summary_text: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957).

name: Water for Elephants
summary_text: Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.

name: Kitchen Nightmares
summary_text: Gordon Ramsay visits struggling restaurants across America and spends one week trying to help them become successful.

name: Blitz
summary_text: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

name: Ink Master
summary_text: Ten of the country's most creative and skilled tattoo artists are judged by icons of the tattoo world. They compete for a hundred thousand dollars and the title of "INK MASTER".

name: La Llorona
summary_text: An aging paranoid war criminal, protected by his faithful wife, faces death while being haunted by the ghosts of his past.

name: The Thick of It
summary_text: Set in the corridors of power and spin, the Minister for Social Affairs is continually harassed by Number 10's policy enforcer and dependent on his not-so-reliable team of civil servants.

name: Black Beauty
summary_text: A wild horse and a teenage girl forge an unbreakable bond which keeps them connected for a lifetime.

name: Kodachrome
summary_text: Set during the final days of the admired photo development system known as Kodachrome, a father and son hit the road in order to reach the Kansas photo lab before it closes its doors for good.

name: Meet the Spartans
summary_text: A spoof of 300 (2006) and many other movies, TV series/shows/commercials, video games and celebrities. King Leonidas of Sparta and his army of 12 go to war against Xerxes of Persia to fight to the death for Sparta's freedom.

name: Breathe: Into the Shadows
summary_text: "A father's love can save a life... or take one," sets the tone for a dark and gritty series.

name: Derailed
summary_text: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

name: The Blackcoat's Daughter
summary_text: Two girls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break.

name: Never Look Away
summary_text: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

name: Ben 10: Ultimate Alien
summary_text: With his secret identity now revealed to the world, Ben Tennyson continues to fight evil as a superhero with the help of the newly acquired Ultimatrix.

name: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
summary_text: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

name: Skin
summary_text: A destitute young man, raised by racist skinheads and notorious among white supremacists, turns his back on hatred and violence to transform his life, with the help of a black activist and the woman he loves.

name: The Long Home
summary_text: A young contractor is hired to build a honky-tonk in Tennessee by the man who killed his father.

name: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
summary_text: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

name: Detroit Rock City
summary_text: In 1978, four rebellious teenagers try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

name: Still Standing
summary_text: Bill and Judy are not your average parents; the kids are the responsible ones.

name: Antz
summary_text: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

name: Looks That Kill
summary_text: The story of a teenage boy who deals with the ups and downs of being lethally attractive.

name: Dare Me
summary_text: The lives of several cheerleaders are changed forever when a shocking crime rocks their quiet suburban world.

name: The Loudest Voice
summary_text: 7-part limited series about Roger Ailes, the founder of Fox News, focusing on the past decade which Ailes arguably became the Republican Party's de facto leader and the sexual harassment accusations that brought his career to an end.

name: Persian Lessons
summary_text: A young Jewish man pretends to be Iranian to avoid being executed in a concentration camp.

name: The Black Cauldron
summary_text: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

name: Serendipity
summary_text: A couple search for each other years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

name: Escape Room
summary_text: Six friends test their intelligence when an escape room they participate in takes a dark and twisted turn.

name: The King and I
summary_text: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

name: Wag the Dog
summary_text: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

name: James and the Giant Peach
summary_text: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

name: Quills
summary_text: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

name: Angels in America
summary_text: Playwright Tony Kushner adapted his political epic about the A.I.D.S. crisis during the mid 1980s and centers the story around a group of separate but connected individuals.

name: Run All Night
summary_text: Mobster and hit man Jimmy Conlon has one night to figure out where his loyalties lie: with his estranged son, Mike, whose life is in danger, or his longtime best friend, mob boss Shawn Maguire, who wants Mike to pay for the death of his own son.

name: Maximum Overdrive
summary_text: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

name: The Lion King II: Simba's Pride
summary_text: Simba's daughter is the key to a resolution of a bitter feud between Simba's pride and the outcast pride led by the mate of Scar.

name: The Infiltrator
summary_text: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

name: The Selection
summary_text: Centers on a working class young woman chosen by lottery to participate in a competition with 35 other women for the Royal Prince's hand to become the nation's next queen. Balancing her ...                See full summary »
